attributes.action: Allow both boys and girls to go to the toilet during lessons.
attributes.additional_details: Normally the excuse you should of gone at break would come up but it is disappointing that teachers do this.
attributes.background: To allow both boys and girls to leave the classroom without an excuse or reason to go. Children are afraid or embarrassed on what the teachers may think of their reason. Especially girls when they need to go they need to go. They can’t control when their menstrual cycle happens.

rejection.details:
Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools and teachers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how a school or teacher deals with requests to use the toilet, you should raise this with the school or relevant local authority.
